author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fleetcor Incurred & Expects To Continue To Incur Legal & Other Professional Expenses Related To Unauthorized Access Incident
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Fleetcor Technologies Inc:
* FLEETCOR -CO INCURRED & EXPECTS TO CONTINUE TO INCUR LEGAL & OTHER PROFESSIONAL EXPENSES RELATED TO UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS INCIDENT IN FUTURE PERIODS
* FLEETCOR-BELIEVES SIGNIFICANT NUMBER OF GIFT CARD,PIN NUMBERS ISSUED BY 6 STORED VALUE SOLUTIONS CUSTOMERS WERE ACCESSED IN APRIL 26 REPORTED INCIDENT Source text: ( bit.ly/2wzl8Xy ) Further company coverage:
